name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient DevOps Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, I excel in utilizing **Google Cloud Platform (GCP)**, **AWS**, and **Terraform** to build and manage scalable solutions. My technical skills include orchestrating containerized applications with **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, implementing CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **CircleCI**, and managing databases with **SQL**, **NoSQL**, and cloud services such as **Cloud SQL** and **RDS**.
  My expertise also extends to monitoring and observability tools like **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Datadog**, ensuring high availability and performance of applications. I am adept in scripting with **Bash** and proficient in **Python**, enhancing automation processes and system integrations.
  In addition to my technical acumen, I possess a solid foundation in full-stack development and microservices architecture, which complements my DevOps practices, ensuring seamless collaboration between development and operations. I have successfully led enterprise initiatives within healthcare and financial sectors, driving operational excellence and compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
